name: Soul Detective (Maxwell Neale)
description:
In a plane where souls are trapped and forgotten, the only one who can help release them is the soul of a detective who mysteriously appeared.  A plot to gate-keep honorable souls from moving onto the afterlife was discovered, and only you can stop them. Doing so may also unravel the detectives own past life and their destination in the land beyond.

A detective trapped in the lands between, you and your trusty magnifying glass will get you though hell and back

Project created through University of Central Florida - Games Workshop.
Still in development, finished project to come end of spring 2023.

Producer | Art, Maxwell Neale
Creative Director, Arin Symonds

Cover image illustrated by Noah King

Controls - 1. Mouse&Keyboard - 2. Xbox - 3. Dualshock4

~ General ~
Movement: W.A.S.D - Left Stick - Left Stick
Camera Mouse: - Right Stick - Right Stick
Zoomed Aim: Right Click - Left Trigger - Left Trigger
Jumping: Spacebar - A Button - X Button
Sprinting: (Hold) Left Shit - (Press) Left Stick - (Press) Left Stick
Melee Attack: Left Click - X Button - Square Button
Weapon Wheel: (Hold) Tab - Left Bumper - Left Bumper
Quit Game: Escape Key - Start Button - Start Button
Boss Lock-On: Q Key - Left Directional Pad - Left Directional Pad

~ Abilities ~
On the wheel there are three available, leftmost is our ranged attack, up top is our telekinesis, and the right most is our possession mechanic which is used for puzzles.
(After Selecting ability with the Weapon Wheel, and Zoomed Aiming is active)

Telekinesis Activation: F Key - B Button - Circle Button
Telekinesis Pull: Q Key - Left Bumper - Left Bumper
Telekinesis Push: E Key - Right Bumper - Right Bumper

Long Range Attack: F Key & F Key to throw - B Button & B Button to throw - Circle Button & Circle Button to throw

Possession: F Key - B Button - Circle Button
Possession End: Q Key - B Button - Circle Button
